[Icedemons forces leave there Homeworld Auir to stop a thing threating 
the whole galxey. yanshosh getting to drive they land on earth and 
head toward Arizona.]

Angel Prime/Tigerhawk/Silverbolt/Fury


Angel Prime saw both of the attack from the alliance members. he flys 
out the way.


Angel Prime:


"is this the best you all have?"


Angel Prime fires so many fireballs at Scattershot that fire twisters 
starts. strong enough to melt any kind of metal. it catches 
scattershot in the middle.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Tigerhawk lands and transforms.


Tigerhawk:


"I remember this place it is where we were taken by the vok."



~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Silverbolt dives making sure any other shots missed him. He pulled a 
missle out his wing and threw it at Dark Wulf.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Fury ran over Oblitercon foot in tank mode.
